Pic: Love is a state of being.
Description - can be same as pic: Your love is not outside; it is deep within you. You can never lose it, and it cannot leave you.

Pic: Love is not an emotion.
Description - can be same as pic: Love is a state of being in harmony with oneself.

Pic: Love is not directed to one person.
Description - can be same as pic: Believing that we only get one soulmate is a trap that is based on fear — fear of loving and losing again. When you look at your ability to connect with friends and family, clearly you’re capable of loving more than one person.

Pic: Love is contagious.
Description - can be same as pic: Someone who experienced true love wants to share it further.

Pic: Love is patient and kind.
Description - can be same as pic: The heart in love remains soft and sensitive. But when you’re hell-bent on getting this or the other thing, you become ruthless, hard, and insensitive.

Pic: Love is not possesive.
Description - can be same as pic: How can you love people when you need people? You can only use them. If I need you to make me happy, I’ve got to use you, I’ve got to manipulate you, I’ve got to find ways and means of winning you. I cannot let you be free

Pic: Letting go is probably the most difficult quality of love.
Description - can be same as pic: I can only love people when I have emptied my life of people. When I die to the need for people, then I’m right in the desert. In the beginning it feels awful, it feels lonely, but if you can take it for a while, you’ll suddenly discover that it isn’t lonely at all. It is solitude, it is aloneness, and the desert begins to flower.

Pic: Trust is reality not in your concepts.
Description - can be same as pic: Do not expect the world to fit into your interpretations. Trust only what is.

Pic: There is nothing (and everything) that defines you.
Description - can be same as pic: Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.

Pic: Do not fight with your thoughts, be at peace with them.
Description - can be same as pic: Every thought, every feeling, is a visitor. You just say: Welcome! Come in and sit with me.

Pic: Each of us is a perspective.
Description - can be same as pic: Thats the only thing that stays consistent about us through life.

Pic: Loss is not about what was you lost it is about you.
Description - can be same as pic: We experience losses when we had identified with what was lost. We have to let go part of our identity in the grief process.

Pic: Lose and you will find.
Description - can be same as pic: When I had nothing to lose, I had everything. When I stopped being who I am, I found myself.

Pic: One cannot lose love.
Description - can be same as pic: No one loses anyone, because no one owns anyone. That is the true experience of freedom: having the most important thing in the world without owning it

Pic: Love is fearless.
Description - can be same as pic: There are basically two movements of consciousness: Love and Fear. Love is allowing what is and fear is resisting it.

Pic: One grows though experience.
Description - can be same as pic: It is possible to avoid pain? Yes, but you’ll never learn anything. Is it possible to know something without ever having experiencing it? Yes, but it will never truly be part of you.

Pic: Ego develops over lifetime to finally disolve.
Description - can be same as pic: The moment you become aware of the ego in you, it is strictly speaking no longer the ego, but just an old, conditioned mind-pattern. Ego implies unawareness. Awareness and ego cannot coexist.

Pic: Internet is a form of global consiousness.
Description - can be same as pic: Technology is destructive only in the hands of people who do not realize that they are one and the same process as the universe.

Pic: Developed ego plays with the world.
Description - can be same as pic: Need to evaluate things and persons is abandoned. Merging with the world, no more holding, but engaging in the flow of things. Playful alternation between seriousness and triviality, intermingling of different states of consciousness, thinking in time cycles and historical dimensions, full acceptance of differences and people as they are.

Pic: Relaxing is a skill to be practiced.
Description - can be same as pic: Often overachievers are passionate about many things. Yet it's important to learn not to always care so much. Try being indifferent to things that aren't that important.

Pic: Restlessness will kill you.
Description - can be same as pic: The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple. And yet, everybody rushes around in a great panic as if it were necessary to achieve something beyond themselves.

Pic: You've got to give trust to get trust.
Description - can be same as pic: If you cannot trust yourself, you cannot even trust your mistrust of yourself – so that without this underlying trust in the whole system of nature you are simply paralyzed.

Pic: Start with finding the now.
Description - can be same as pic: No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.

Pic: Being powerless is being powerful.
Description - can be same as pic: The strongest love is the love that can demonstrate its fragility.

Pic: Who am I? The good quesion to start with :)
Description - can be same as pic: Find the source of the I and follow it diligently until you merge with the Source.

Pic: Surrender and you will be free
Description - can be same as pic: One is a great deal less anxious if one feels perfectly free to be anxious, and the same may be said of guilt.

Pic: Don't run, experience!
Description - can be same as pic: It’s better to have a short life full of what you like doing, than a long life spent in a miserable way.

Pic: Happiness is here now. Regardless of cicrumstances.
Description - can be same as pic: The only thing that stops you from experiencing it is you denying it.

Pic: It is not about inventing but picking the thought worth thinking.
Description - can be same as pic: We seldom realize, for example, that our most private thoughts and emotions are not actually our own. For we think in terms of languages and images which we did not invent, but which were given to us by our society.

Pic: There is no joy without accepting sadness.
Description - can be same as pic: We cannot be more sensitive to pleasure without being more sensitive to pain.

Pic: Life is a dance not a marathon.
Description - can be same as pic: Enjoy the dance, do not wait for the song to end.

Pic: Look inside!
Description - can be same as pic: Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.

Pic: If you stop avoiding, what was avoided will avoid you.
Description - can be same as pic: What you run from is where you need to rest. What you fear you need to face. What you ignore you need to hear.

Pic: Meet your fears.
Description - can be same as pic: Anxiety is a sign of the unspoken.

Pic: Do you have a problem now?
Description - can be same as pic: Narrow your life down to this moment. Your life situation may be full of problems - most life situations are - but find out if you have a problem at this moment. Do you have a problem now?

Pic: Do not believe everything you think.
Description - can be same as pic: Thinking is a wonderful tool if it's applied. Thinking, however, can not become the master. Thinking is a very bad master. If you're dominated by thinking then your life becomes very restricted.

Pic: You will always feel like not enough if you attach your value to something.
Description - can be same as pic: If you care about money, you will never be rich enough. If you care about your appereance you will always feel ugly.

Pic: Let failure be your teacher.
Description - can be same as pic: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

Pic: Life is a flow.
Description - can be same as pic: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.

Pic: Let love guide you.
Description - can be same as pic: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.

Pic: Do not look for beauty, just look. You will see it.
Description - can be same as pic: Everything has its beauty, but not everyone sees it.

Pic: Do not be yourself, be us.
Description - can be same as pic: Never do to others what you would not like them to do to you.

Pic: Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated.
Description - can be same as pic: Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated.

Pic: Experience! Than you will understand.
Description - can be same as pic: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.

Pic: Do rather than talk.
Description - can be same as pic: The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.

Pic: Suffering fosters healing.
Description - can be same as pic: What hurts us is what heals us.

Pic: Self is a believe.
Description - can be same as pic: You are what you believe yourself to be.

Pic: Do not hold back. Go.
Description - can be same as pic: You have to take risks. We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen.

Pic: Love! Do not try to understand but do it.
Description - can be same as pic: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.

Pic: Love is not to be explained, it is to be.
Description - can be same as pic: Certain things in life simply have to be experienced -and never explained. Love is such a thing.

Pic: There is no one right path for everyone.
Description - can be same as pic: We can never judge the lives of others, because each person knows only their own pain and renunciation. It’s one thing to feel that you are on the right path, but it’s another to think that yours is the only path.

Pic: Knowing wont replace doing.
Description - can be same as pic: People never learn anything by being told, they have to find out for themselves.

Pic: Learn love, every other skill will follow.
Description - can be same as pic: When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.

Pic: Love is not to be traded or expected.
Description - can be same as pic: Anyone who loves in the expectation of being loved in return is wasting their time.

Pic: Do not try to undersnd love, just do it.
Description - can be same as pic: The wise are wise only because they love. The fool are fools only because they think they can understand love.

Pic: Happiness is attitude.
Description - can be same as pic: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in likeing what one does.

Pic: Happiness is a skill.
Description - can be same as pic: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.

Pic: Happiness is now.
Description - can be same as pic: There is no way to happiness, happiness is the way.

Pic: Happiness is giving.
Description - can be same as pic: Happiness doesn't result from what we get, but from what we give.
